gui

Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Score
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Handles the creation and displaying of the score in the game.
    Author:
    nicholasadamou
